CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.BU__c, "ESPPUBCAPTIF"), "Non Alimentaire", IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.BU__c, "ESPPUBRP"), "Régie Physique", IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.BU__c, "ESPPUBHORSCAPTIF"), "Hors Captif", IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.BU__c, "ESPPUBALIMENTAIR"), "Alimentaire", IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.BU__c, "ESPPUBPART"), "Cashback Webloyalty", IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.BU__c, "ESPPUBPROG"), "AdEx", IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.BU__c, "ESPPUBNIP"), "NIP", IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.BU__c, "ESPPUBAUTRES"), "Autres", IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.BU__c, "ESPPUBCLAB"), "CLAB", IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.BU__c, "ESPPUBW2S"), "WEB TO STORE", ""
))))))))))
CustomField.label: BU
